Key Match Events: Mayank Yadav bowled with a rattling pace in a promising debut
Varun Chakaravarthy made an impressive comeback
India bundled out Bangladesh for a below-par 127
India chased the target in 11.5 overs with a dominating seven-wicket win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Gwalior
Others: Arshdeep Singh was the pick of the bowlers with three wickets
Sanju Samson scored 29 off 19 before falling short of a half-century
Hardik Pandya and Nitish Kumar Reddy guided India to the victory
The second T20I will be played on 9th October, Wednesday in New Delhi
